Package controller

Class AppController

java.lang.Object
controller.AppController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The AppController class contains the logic to coordinate the menu and gameplay of the application
Version:
July 21, 2024
Author:
Andrew Polyak

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
    The initialize method instantiates a FlappyBirdMenuController object and calls it's detectInput method to allow the program to listen to the user's menu inputs
    The method also calls begins the game once the user indicates they'd like to do so with the relevant input
    private Bird
    initializeBirdModel()
    The initializeBirdModel method instantiates a Bird object using the selected bird skin
    private Tube
    initializeTubeModel(Tube tube, javafx.scene.image.ImageView model, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle hitBox)
    The initializeTubeModel method instantiates a Tube object
    private void
    playGame()
    The playGame method hides the menu, shows the game-specific UI, instantiates the FlappyBirdGameController class, and calls the class's play method to begin the game

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      The initialize method instantiates a FlappyBirdMenuController object and calls it's detectInput method to allow the program to listen to the user's menu inputs
      The method also calls begins the game once the user indicates they'd like to do so with the relevant input
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • playGame

      private void playGame()
      The playGame method hides the menu, shows the game-specific UI, instantiates the FlappyBirdGameController class, and calls the class's play method to begin the game

    • initializeBirdModel

      private Bird initializeBirdModel()
      The initializeBirdModel method instantiates a Bird object using the selected bird skin
      Returns:
      birdModel, a Bird object

    • initializeTubeModel

      The initializeTubeModel method instantiates a Tube object

      model -
      hitBox -
